sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Card,Badge } from 'react-bootstrap'
import { LinkContainer} from 'react-router-bootstrap'

function ProductPreview({_id,category,name,pictures}) {
  return <LinkContainer to={`/product/${_id}`} style={{cursor:'pointer',width:"13rem",margin:"10px"}}>
    <Card style={{width:"20rem",margin:"10px"}}>
        <Card.Img variant="top" className="product-preview-img" src={pictures[0].url} />
        <Card.Body>
            <Card.Title>{name}</Card.Title>
            <Badge bg="warning" text="dark">{category}</Badge>

        </Card.Body>
    </Card>
  </LinkContainer>
}

export default ProductPreview
